name: The Depths of Science HD
description:
There's something suspicious going on at Deeptech, the research facility that just went into lockdown. It's your job to clean the place up, and find out what's going on deep in this facility as you make your way down to the basement. Progress through the floors by finding the keycards the scientists have left behind, and fight your way through the increasingly bizarre monsters but make sure to keep any eye on your ammo. Thanks for playing our first 3d game! The game was made entirely by Trusty and Cheeks using the Unity game engine. All game models were made from scratch in Blender. We really appreciate all feeback and comments!

 Controls: 

LMB to shoot

RMB to melee 

R to reload

E to interact

WASD/ZQSD to move

Credits:

Programming: Trusty/Sean

3D Art: Cheeks/Thomas

Gameplay Trailer Music: m_mann

Linux and Mac version coming soon!
